price: Na wakhalifu watauona Moto na watajua ya kwamba wao lazima wataingia humo; wala hawatapata pa kuuepuka.
arabic: وَرَءَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ ٱلنَّارَ فَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُم مُّوَاقِعُوهَا وَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ عَنۡهَا مَصۡرِفٗا
footnotes: Na wakosefu watauona Moto na watayakinika kuwa hapana shaka watauingia tu. Wala hawatakuwa na pahala pengine badala yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waraā al-muj'rimūna al-nāra faẓannū annahum muwāqiʿūhā walam yajidū ʿanhā maṣrifan
